channel.title: Comments on: Notes 8 Beta 2 – First Impressions

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Thanks for the tip Bruce. As Robin pointed out, I hadn't read the documentation, I need to be accessing either a local replica or a Domino 8 server for the twistie to work. <br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the tip Bruce. As Robin pointed out, I hadn’t read the documentation, I need to be accessing either a local replica or a Domino 8 server for the twistie to work.

Matt

item.title: By: Bruce Elgort
item.dc:creator: Bruce Elgort
item.description: <p>Matt,<br /><br />For the mail threads it seems you have to hover over a message. You will then see a twistie appear next to the subject (I think). Once you hover away from it then it will dissapear.<br /><br />Let me know if that works for you.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt,

For the mail threads it seems you have to hover over a message. You will then see a twistie appear next to the subject (I think). Once you hover away from it then it will dissapear.

Let me know if that works for you.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Aha, thanks Rob I guess I should just RTFM!<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Aha, thanks Rob I guess I should just RTFM!

Matt

item.title: By: Robin Wills
item.dc:creator: Robin Wills
item.description: <p>Hi Matt,<br/><br />From the readme file that came with the download:<br/><br />"The display of mail threads at the view level works for local replicas, but requires a Domino 8 server for server-based replicas."<br/><br />HTH, Rob.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi Matt,

From the readme file that came with the download:

“The display of mail threads at the view level works for local replicas, but requires a Domino 8 server for server-based replicas.”

HTH, Rob.
